text: The Saloli (meaning: Squirrel) is an area of the town of Vasai (Bassein), part of Palghar district of the state of Maharashtra, India comprises the following villages: ==Villages == *Atodiwadi *Devalbhat *Prathambahat *Dolbhat *Pholodi *Kaular Wadi *Tiwarbhat *Kharbhat *Sutarbhat *Dhupalwadi *Silshiwadi *Javghar *Naglai *Talai *Agardam *Vaitodi *Bhoronde *Kerlai *Nalai *Levdi *Gunbhat *Patlar *Dhupalwadi *Chavriwadi Category:Villages in Palghar district
title: Saloli
